name: AVLayerVideoGravity
desc: A structure that defines how a layer displays a player’s visual content within the layer’s bounds.

items.name: static let resize: AVLayerVideoGravity
items.desc: The video stretches to fill the layer’s bounds.

items.name: static let resizeAspect: AVLayerVideoGravity
items.desc: The video preserves its aspect ratio and fits it within the layer’s bounds.

items.name: static let resizeAspectFill: AVLayerVideoGravity
items.desc: The video preserves its aspect ratio and fills the layer’s bounds.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a video gravity with a string value.
